allFunctionsDefinitions: function checkProductAvailability(birthDate,isMinor,scenario,isProductDisabled){if (isProductDisabled === true) {this.errorCode = 450;this.errorMessage = "Product is not available";return false;} if (scenario!=null && scenario!="" && scenario.toUpperCase() == "HOMETILE") {return true;} var age = birthdayfunction(birthDate);if (isMinor.toString().toUpperCase() == "TRUE"){if(age >= ageMinorLower && age <= ageMinorUpper){return true;} else {this.errorMessage = "Age should be within ageMinorLower to ageMinorUpper years for a minor.";this.errorCode = 450;return false;}} if(isMinor.toString().toUpperCase() == "FALSE"){ if(age >= ageLower && age <= ageUpper){return true;} else {this.errorMessage = "Age should be within ageLower to ageUpper years for an adult.";this.errorCode = 450;return false;} } else {this.errorMessage = "Please define isMinor value properly";this.errorCode = 450;return false;}}
functionBody: if (isProductDisabled === true) {this.errorCode = 450;this.errorMessage = "Product is not available";return false;} if (scenario!=null && scenario!="" && scenario.toUpperCase() == "HOMETILE") {return true;} var age = birthdayfunction(birthDate);if (isMinor.toString().toUpperCase() == "TRUE"){if(age >= ageMinorLower && age <= ageMinorUpper){return true;} else {this.errorMessage = "Age should be within ageMinorLower to ageMinorUpper years for a minor.";this.errorCode = 450;return false;}} if(isMinor.toString().toUpperCase() == "FALSE"){ if(age >= ageLower && age <= ageUpper){return true;} else {this.errorMessage = "Age should be within ageLower to ageUpper years for an adult.";this.errorCode = 450;return false;} } else {this.errorMessage = "Please define isMinor value properly";this.errorCode = 450;return false;}
